name: profile
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: profile
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a short description of someone's life, work, character, etc.
information about a person's life, work, interests, etc. on a social networking website

example.eg: You can post your relationship status on your Facebook profile.
example.egtrans: 你可以在脸书的“个人资料”栏发布你的关系状态。

dsense.name: profile
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the amount of public attention and notice that something receives

example.eg: We need to increase our company's profile in Asia.
example.egtrans: 我们需要扩大公司在亚洲的影响力。

example.eg: There is a growing number of women in high-profile positions (= positions which they are noticed) in the government.
example.egtrans: 在备受注目的政府职位上，女性的数量在逐渐增长。

dsense.name: profile
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a side view of a person's face

example.eg: Drawing profiles is somehow easier than drawing the full face.
example.egtrans: 不知为什么画侧面像要比画整张脸容易。

example.eg: The actor is photographed in profile, smoking a cigarette.
example.egtrans: 这个演员被人从侧面拍了一张抽烟的照片。
